content: The experience was an awesome team building exercise! We will definitely return! The students felt that it helped them learn to rely on the knowledge each one had of different items so that they could succeed as a team.

content: Did this tour with my kids last week. It was awesome. Our guide Don kept the little ones involved and did a fantastic job. Highly recommend!

content: Such a fun experience while in Charleston for our honeymoon! Great way to enjoy some of the classic Charleston cuisine, and our tour guide was fun and gave excellent recommendations as well!

content: We had a great time on the carriage. Carol was an exceptional tour guide proving many details of Old Charleston. Our horse Jake was also great. You can tell the two enjoy working with each other

content: Very enjoyable tour of the city. Comfortable ride with a knowledgeable guide. Did not feel like the "odd man out" going as a solo among couples and families. Recommend to all

content: Our guide was "Hoon" Calhoun what a wealth of knowledge and great personality! The food was awesome and the overall experience was exactly what we were hoping for. We definitely recommend this tour, Upper King Street.

content: Good selection of restaurants. The guide was very good with information not just about food but also about historical events, streets and people of Charleston.

content: The Old South Carriage Company was first class from start to finish. Our group learned so much about the history of Charleston while having a great time seeing the sights. You can view the horse stalls as you get on the carriage - you walk.

content: This was our first time in Charleston. We traveled with my 19 year old daughter and her boyfriend. I am so glad I booked this tour in advance, we learned many great facts about this charming city that we would not have learned otherwise.
title: Enjoyable carriage ride

title: Newsroom

title: Interesting concept

content: Our best adventure in NZ so far. It is by far better than any of the activities in Queenstown which are all overpriced. Here in Wanaka you get better deal. The river journey on the jet boat is just as thrilling as those in Queenstown...

content: Patrick was amazing! So knowledgeable Patrick so knowledgeable about food, chefs, and the history of food in Charleston. MUCH more than I expected.....MORE than enough/meal.

content: My team had a great experience escaping the 80's! Cliff, thanks for your great customer service! Several team members are planning their return trips already.
title: Fun Times!

content: I had a great time solving mysteries with my co-workers. Reminded me of Scobby Doo and friends solving mysteries!
title: Awesome

content: Glen was a great guide! He told us about the local restaurant scene while we ate delicious food! Definitely recommend!
title: Awesome Experience!

content: My wife and I really enjoyed our tour. The employees were all great and courteous. I am a farrier so the care given to the horses was very important to me. I can say that I was very impressed with the entire operation.

content: My family and I have used this company several times. In 2007 we used them fo our daughter’s bridal party to take a ride after the wedding. It was wonderful! Love this company and recommend them highly!

content: Great tour and tour guide. Wonderful city of Charleston and such a nice way to see so much of it. This is an excellent business. Will definitely use this company again.

content: Carriage tours with Old South Carriage Company are extremely informative and extremely safe. The horses are super sweet and very well taken care of. Will highly recommend!
title: Weekend staycation

content: We loved meeting the chefs with our guide, Hoon Calhoun! He was full of lively stories, giving us just the context we needed to fully appreciate where we were standing. Meeting the chefs and tasting a few things was fabulous. How the time flew by....
title: Would do it again!

title: Always something new

content: This is a must do when in Charleston! The guides provide informative information about the history of Charleston! The horses are also so beautiful!
title: Tours

title: Walking Tour

content: It was only two of us and we was close to making it out! The clues were great and i really enjoyed going!
title: Great experience !

content: Our experience with Old South was the best we’ve had in Charleston!! The employees were attentive and helpful, the guide was so much fun and very knowledgeable, and the overall care of the horses looked great. I would recommend to everyone!
title: The Best in Town!

content: Our guide was very informative and humorous with a great personality. Highly recommend the carriage ride to learn more of the history of Charleston. Ride was approximately an hour.
title: Historic ride

content: I have taken the tour on 3 different occasions and been on 3 different routes. It's been a very enjoyable experience each time. The guides are very knowledgeable about the beautiful city of Charleston. And I appreciate the horses are well cared for.
